mapper.sql: id, appraisecode, awardcode, filename, filetype, filepath, filedetail, remark, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into award_file ( appraisecode, awardcode, filename, filetype, filepath,filedetail,remark, create_time) values
( #{item.appraisecode}, #{item.awardcode}, #{item.filename}, #{item.filetype}, #{item.filepath}, #{item.filedetail}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createTime} )

insert into award_file
id,
appraisecode,
awardcode,
filename,
filetype,
filepath,
filedetail,
remark,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update award_file
appraisecode = #{appraisecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
awardcode = #{awardcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filetype = #{filetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filedetail = #{filedetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update award_file set appraisecode = #{appraisecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, awardcode = #{awardcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filetype = #{filetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filedetail = #{filedetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
